meanings.definition: The quality or state of being stylish.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded stylishnesses at the party.
meanings.sent2: I admire the stylishnesses of his home decor.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked with such stylishnesses, it looked like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with the stylishnesses of neon lights.
meanings.sent5: The stylishnesses of the painting captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The stylish qualities or characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: The magazine highlighted the stylishnesses of the new handbag collection.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the stylishnesses of the vintage car.
meanings.sent3: The dog's collar had a touch of stylishnesses with its sparkly charm.
meanings.sent4: The garden was transformed by the stylishnesses of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: His speech had a certain stylishnesses that made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The stylishnesses of the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent1: Fashion designers strive to capture the stylishnesses of the season.
meanings.sent2: The runway show displayed the stylishnesses of the upcoming trends.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with the stylishnesses of a high-end fashion label.
meanings.sent4: Her accessories added a touch of stylishnesses to her overall look.
meanings.sent5: The stylishnesses of the event made it a must-attend affair.
